name: MIS National IEP Entry Level Monitoring
description: PDD0051 v00.00.03 Last Modified: 02/11/15 This report shows by establishment the number adult prisoners admitted in a specified date range, the number of those who were awarded Entry level IEP, the number of those who progressed to Standard or Enhanced IEP after  2 weeks.

dataset.name: MIS Load
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT TRUNC(BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.LOAD_END_DATETIME) AS LOAD_END_DATE FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE (BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.LOAD_ID = (SELECT MAX(LOAD_ID) FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE NOT LOAD_END_DATETIME IS NULL))), dataset_ AS (SELECT LOAD_END_DATE FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Adult Admissions
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, CASE WHEN AT_DOB.DAY_DATE <> '31/12/9000' THEN AT_DOB.DAY_DATE END AS DATE_OF_BIRTH, AT_ESTABLISHMENT_EXT_MOV_TO.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK, AT_ESTABLISHMENT_EXT_MOV_TO.ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, AT_DIM_DATE_EXT_MOV.DAY_DATE FROM BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_DOB, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT_EXT_MOV_TO, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_DIM_DATE_EXT_MOV, BODIMIS.FACT_MOVEMENT_EXTERNAL AT_FACT_MOV_EXT WHERE (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.BIRTH_DATE_SK = AT_DOB.DATE_SK) AND (AT_FACT_MOV_EXT.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK) AND (AT_DIM_DATE_EXT_MOV.DATE_SK = AT_FACT_MOV_EXT.DATE_SK) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT_EXT_MOV_TO.ESTABLISHMENT_SK (+) = AT_FACT_MOV_EXT.TO_LOCATION_SK) AND (AT_DIM_DATE_EXT_MOV.DAY_DATE >= TO_DATE('01-12-2013 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AND AT_DIM_DATE_EXT_MOV.DAY_DATE <= TO_DATE('14-12-2013 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AND AT_FACT_MOV_EXT.TYPE = 'Admission' AND AT_FACT_MOV_EXT.DIRECTION_CODE = 'IN' AND NOT AT_FACT_MOV_EXT.REASON_CODE IN ('R', 'TRN', 'INT', 'TRNCRT', 'TRNTAP', 'T', 'M') AND NOT AT_ESTABLISHMENT_EXT_MOV_TO.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK IN ('ZZGHI,TRN'))), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, DATE_OF_BIRTH, ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK, ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, DAY_DATE FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: All Establishments
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT WHERE (AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND (NOT AT_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK IN ('ZZGHI', 'TRN') AND AT_ESTABLISHMENT.AREA_DESCRIPTION <> 'Not Available')), dataset_ AS (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Entry Assigned
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, CASE WHEN AT_DOB.DAY_DATE <> '31/12/9000' THEN AT_DOB.DAY_DATE END AS DATE_OF_BIRTH, AT_DIM_DATE_EXT_MOV.DAY_DATE, AT_IEP_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK, AT_IEP_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, AT_DIM_OFFENDER_IEP_LEVEL.IEP_DATE_TIME FROM BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_IEP_ESTABLISHMENT, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_DOB, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_DIM_DATE_EXT_MOV, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_IEP_LEVEL AT_DIM_OFFENDER_IEP_LEVEL, BODIMIS.FACT_MOVEMENT_EXTERNAL AT_FACT_MOV_EXT, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT_EXT_MOV_TO WHERE (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.BIRTH_DATE_SK = AT_DOB.DATE_SK) AND (AT_FACT_MOV_EXT.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK) AND (AT_DIM_DATE_EXT_MOV.DATE_SK = AT_FACT_MOV_EXT.DATE_SK) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT_EXT_MOV_TO.ESTABLISHMENT_SK (+) = AT_FACT_MOV_EXT.TO_LOCATION_SK) AND (AT_DIM_OFFENDER_IEP_LEVEL.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID_NK (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_ID_NK) AND (AT_IEP_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_DIM_OFFENDER_IEP_LEVEL.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_DIM_OFFENDER_IEP_LEVEL.IEP_LEVEL = 'ENT' AND NOT AT_IEP_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK IN ('TRN', 'ZZGHI') AND AT_DIM_OFFENDER_IEP_LEVEL.IEP_DATE_TIME >= TO_DATE('01-12-2013 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AND AT_DIM_OFFENDER_IEP_LEVEL.IEP_DATE_TIME <= TO_DATE('14-12-2013 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AND AT_DIM_OFFENDER_IEP_LEVEL.IEP_LEVEL_SEQ = 1 AND AT_DIM_DATE_EXT_MOV.DAY_DATE >= TO_DATE('01-12-2013 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AND AT_DIM_DATE_EXT_MOV.DAY_DATE <= TO_DATE('14-12-2013 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AND AT_FACT_MOV_EXT.DIRECTION_CODE = 'IN' AND AT_FACT_MOV_EXT.TYPE = 'Admission' AND NOT AT_FACT_MOV_EXT.REASON_CODE IN ('TRN', 'INT', 'TRNCRT', 'TRNTAP', 'T', 'M', 'R') AND AT_IEP_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK = AT_ESTABLISHMENT_EXT_MOV_TO.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK)), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, DATE_OF_BIRTH, DAY_DATE, ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK, ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, IEP_DATE_TIME FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: IEP Progression
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_IEP_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK, AT_IEP_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, AT_DIM_OFFENDER_IEP_LEVEL.IEP_DATE_TIME, AT_DIM_DATE_EXT_MOV.DAY_DATE, CASE WHEN AT_DOB.DAY_DATE <> '31/12/9000' THEN AT_DOB.DAY_DATE END AS DATE_OF_BIRTH, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY FROM BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_IEP_ESTABLISHMENT, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_IEP_LEVEL AT_DIM_OFFENDER_IEP_LEVEL, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_DIM_DATE_EXT_MOV, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_DOB, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.FACT_MOVEMENT_EXTERNAL AT_FACT_MOV_EXT WHERE (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.BIRTH_DATE_SK = AT_DOB.DATE_SK) AND (AT_FACT_MOV_EXT.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK) AND (AT_DIM_DATE_EXT_MOV.DATE_SK = AT_FACT_MOV_EXT.DATE_SK) AND (AT_DIM_OFFENDER_IEP_LEVEL.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID_NK (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_ID_NK) AND (AT_IEP_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_DIM_OFFENDER_IEP_LEVEL.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_DIM_OFFENDER_IEP_LEVEL.IEP_LEVEL IN ('BAS', 'ENH', 'STD') AND NOT AT_IEP_ESTABLISHMENT.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK IN ('TRN', 'ZZGHI') AND AT_DIM_OFFENDER_IEP_LEVEL.IEP_LEVEL_SEQ >= 2 AND AT_DIM_OFFENDER_IEP_LEVEL.IEP_DATE_TIME >= TO_DATE('01-12-2013 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AND AT_DIM_DATE_EXT_MOV.DAY_DATE >= TO_DATE('01-12-2013 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AND AT_DIM_DATE_EXT_MOV.DAY_DATE <= TO_DATE('14-12-2013 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS') AND AT_FACT_MOV_EXT.TYPE = 'Admission' AND AT_FACT_MOV_EXT.DIRECTION_CODE = 'IN' AND NOT AT_FACT_MOV_EXT.REASON_CODE IN ('R', 'TRN', 'INT', 'TRNCRT', 'TRNTAP', 'T', 'M') AND AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY IN (SELECT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY FROM BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_IEP_LEVEL AT_DIM_OFFENDER_IEP_LEVEL WHERE (AT_DIM_OFFENDER_IEP_LEVEL.OFFENDER_BOOK_ID_NK (+) = AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_ID_NK) AND (AT_DIM_OFFENDER_IEP_LEVEL.IEP_LEVEL = 'ENT' AND AT_DIM_OFFENDER_IEP_LEVEL.IEP_LEVEL_SEQ = 1)))), dataset_ AS (SELECT ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK, ESTABLISHMENT_DESCRIPTION, IEP_DATE_TIME, DAY_DATE, DATE_OF_BIRTH, OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY FROM dataset_base_)
